user.title: Enter serial number
user.description: Enter the serial number for your SmartEVSE as it is anounced by mDNS on your network (e.g. SmartEVSE-5123.local enter 5123)

user_ip.title: Enter IP Address
user_ip.description: Since we couldn't find your device through mDNS, enter the IP address or hostname (e.g. 10.0.0.76 or smartevse-12345.lan)

error.cannot_connect: Failing to connect to HOST/settings. Try again.
